item.title: Street cleansing request - Seacourt road, 22nd January
item.description:
Outside of the entrance of Willow bank primary school lots of leaves and dog fouling. This is causing a hazard for the children and parents as they are walking along the pavement. The entrance of the school is on Seacourt road. There are 2 main gates that this is affecting the pedestrian gate next to car park gate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seacourt Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working., 22nd January
item.description:
Light is maintained by Greenwich Council. It has been out for a wrap months. There are public steps allowing access to the roadway or onto site and at night it is pitch black and very hard to navigate the concrete steps. Iâ€™m disabled and a fall could be pretty detrimental to my life, without wishing to be over dramatic, this needs to be fixed asap please. Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combe Avenue, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Lamp Post 83 Hurst Road is not working., 22nd January
item.description:
Lamp Post 83 Hurst Road is not working 05:30 22/01/2026. Located on the pavement at corner of corner of Parkhill and Hust road in front of the large red doors of the Bexley United Reform Church. what3word location ///cotton.rapid.shirts This is not on the councils lamp post map. Previously reported in October25 under Report ref: 8254203 but has not been fixed or has failed again.
